br.uff.midiacom.ana.connector
Class NCLAssessmentStatement<S extends NCLStatement,A extends NCLAttributeAssessment,V extends NCLValueAssessment>

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      br.uff.midiacom.ana.NCLElement
          br.uff.midiacom.ana.connector.NCLAssessmentStatement<S,A,V>
All Implemented Interfaces:
NCLStatement<S>, Element, java.lang.Comparable<S>, org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
public class NCLAssessmentStatement<S extends NCLStatement,A extends NCLAttributeAssessment,V extends NCLValueAssessment>
extends NCLElement
implements NCLStatement<S>

Esta classe define o elemento assessmentStatement da Nested Context Language (NCL). Este elemento é o elemento que define uma assertiva de um conector de um documento NCL.

See Also:
ABNT NBR 15606-2:2007
